full_threads.body: @chris need help please, Im not sure which video the customer is referring to.

Hi again!

I've just added a bunch of infographics and noticed the videos have dropped off, as well as the video filter at the top of the page. Are you able to check and just make sure all tiles can be displayed.

Thanks,

Britt

Brittany Tan

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

investmenttrends.com

Hello Britt,

I hope you're doing well.

Currently, they are ordered based on the published date in descending order. This means the newest posts appear at the top, while the oldest are at the bottom.

If you wish to rearrange them, you can simply update the published date. Changing the publish date will adjust the order accordingly.

Feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.

Amazing thank you!

Would it be possible to get a video tutorial on how to reorder posts/tiles on pages?

Many thanks,

Britt
